  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14738</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">I paesi dell'UE</string>
            <string language="en">The EU countries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die EU-Länder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pays d'EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os países do EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι χώρες της ΕΕ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los países del EU</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un cruciverba basato sulla conoscenza dei paesi dell'UE. Per farlo gli studenti devono conoscere i nomi dei 25 paesi della Unione Europea.</string>
            <string language="en">A crossword based on the knowledge of the EU countries. To do it the students should know the names of the 25 EU countries.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kreuzworträtsel basiert auf dem Wissen der 
EU-Länder. Um es zu tun sollten die Kursteilnehmer die Namen 
der 25 EU-Länder kennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des mots croisé basés sur la connaissance des 
pays d'EU. Pour le faire les étudiants devraient savoir les 
noms des 25 pays d'EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um crossword baseado no conhecimento dos países 
do EU. Para fazê-lo os estudantes devem saber os nomes dos 25 
países do EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σταυρόλεξο βασισμένο στη γνώση των χωρών της ΕΕ. 
Για να το κάνουν οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να ξέρουν τα ονόματα 
των 25 χωρών της ΕΕ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un crucigrama basado en el conocimiento de los 
países del EU. Para hacerlo los estudiantes deben saber los 
nombres de los 25 países del EU.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
